msg: Fix for MUSE-169 - unobtrusive addition of setter methods and XmlSerializable implementation to *Descriptor types.

msg: Expose the Form's tracker parameter as a property.
Fix a bug where two expansions on the same line in the template would be merged together into one, invalid expansion.
Add a page for testing around introspection of the ClassLoader heirarchy (towards a "sniffer" to find all application page classes).
